knimeNode.name: Similarity Viewer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays similarity matrix as a heat map. Also allows the sorting with a "query" molecule.

fullDescription.intro: Displays similarity matrix as a heat map. Also allows the sorting with a "query" molecule.
fullDescription.option: The column in the input table which contains chemical structures.
The column which contains the matrix (as calculated with "Distance Matrix Calculate" node from KnimeLabs).
Select this option if the matrix selected above is a distance matrix. Otherwise a similarity matrix is assumed (default).

ports.inPort: A data table with at least one column which contains chemical structures and at least one column which contains a distance or similarity matrix as calculated with "Distance Matrix Calculate" node from KnimeLabs

views.view: A heat map view of the matrix
Allows you to sort the input data using a "query" structure. That is, displays the most (dis)similar structures to the "query" on top.
